title: People in this game aren't even smart enough to read
body: But I'm expected to work with them as they call me an inter with my 1 death as opposed to a jungler or adc with 4-8 deaths when we have the same number of kills and/or assists. _Riiiiiiight_.

replies.body: Wait, aren’t you talking about math skills? Or at the least, counting?
I play against you the other day.  You took first blue from jungle as support morg!  Bad periscope!!!
Oh fuck. That was so bad. I’m sorry. (Or you’re welcome if you were on the other team.)

You were very spammy with that blue....

{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jkBPx5Jw,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-14T04:30:34.843+0000)
>
> I play against you the other day.  You took first blue from jungle as support morg!  Bad periscope!!!

Not possible since I've been playing pbe exclusively. I don't even play morg support. I play bard or sion 100% of the time. Nice try though.
I don’t think he was talking to you.  Bad SangredeNoche

> [{quoted}](name=SangreDeNoche,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jkBPx5Jw,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-14T04:31:36.691+0000)
>
> Not possible since I've been playing pbe exclusively. I don't even play morg support. I play bard or sion 100% of the time. Nice try though.

He did say periscope by name, an ironic misread on a post about people who can’t read, I smiled :)

> [{quoted}](name=Negativity ll,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jkBPx5Jw,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2018-03-14T17:43:01.255+0000)
>
> He did say periscope by name, an ironic misread on a post about people who can’t read, I smiled :)

It came in my inbox as a response to my comment and I figured periscope was either a word I simply didn't recognize or autocorrect was at work.

No, you're expected to just try to win the game - and if it bothers you that much, mute them and report them at the end of the game.

Other players will do what they do - but you do you (so long as you're trying to win!).
Stop playing solo queue then.  Your problems are literally fixed by playing flex instead.

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jkBPx5Jw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-03-14T04:31:15.825+0000)
>
> Stop playing solo queue then.  Your problems are literally fixed by playing flex instead.

Flex is a different sort of clownfest, though..
True, but it at least fixes the problems the OP is talking about.  Don't like your team?  Hand pick one.

Yet you want teammates to work with you? Can't bitch about something when you are the cause of it at other times.


https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2728637681/217792163?tab=overview

> [{quoted}](name=LoveLlamas,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jkBPx5Jw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-03-14T11:28:21.069+0000)
>
> Yet you want teammates to work with you? Can't bitch about something when you are the cause of it at other times.
> 
> 
> https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2728637681/217792163?tab=overview

lol I love it when trolls like you point out that game, completely ignoring the 0/6 and 0/7 players in there as well. They were literally standing still and spamming their taunts until they got killed then flaming me for not "helping." I figured "If I can't beat them, join them." Now people keep complaining to me about how much of a scumbag *I* am when the game was already over when I started dying intentionally. Something like 2 to 30. Then again maybe you didn't ignore those numbers like the last two people did, maybe you're just another person who can't read. *Shrugs*
